name: window-ninja
title: Window Ninja
description: Switch between every open window across all apps and all Spaces
author: devadathanmb

commands.name: window-ninja
commands.title: Window Ninja
commands.description: List and switch between every open window across all apps and Spaces

preferences.name: showMinimizedWindows
preferences.title: Show Minimized Windows

scripts.build: npm run build:swift && ray build --skip-types -o dist
